column4: chrome is great especially so since they pushed out a proper extension support now.
i think chrome makes use of its own internal flash player (or the one you get with nonfree-flashplugin)
i'm using a chrome extension called adthwarte to do what i had adblockplus for .

ChaoticXSinZ, aeon-ltd : my only gripe with chrome is that triple clicking a word on a page selects whitepsace after the sentence.... a word on its own hardly ever gets highlighted without the whitespace.
